accrueInterest(uint256).notice: Accrue interest for a market (IRiskEngine interface)

checkInitialMargin(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Check if a position meets margin requirements with dynamic params

checkOILimit(uint256,int256).notice: Check if opening a position would exceed OI limits

getEffectiveParams(uint256).notice: Get effective (dynamically adjusted) parameters for a market

getGlobalUtilization().notice: Get current utilization across all markets

getMaxPositionSize(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Get max position size for given collateral (IRiskEngine interface)

getPendingBorrowFee(address,uint256).notice: Get pending borrow fee for a position (IRiskEngine interface)

getRequiredCollateral(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Get required collateral for a position size (IRiskEngine interface)

getRiskMetrics(uint256).notice: Get detailed risk metrics for a market

getUtilization(uint256).notice: Get utilization data for a market (IRiskEngine interface)

isLiquidatable(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Check if a position is liquidatable with dynamic params
